name: The Search for a Colour Palette (Demo)
name_original: The Search for a Colour Palette (Demo)
description:
Story:

After a long journey away from home, Mr. ColourFool finds his land in chaos. The castle of demons told by many as a legend appeared before him, and all the colours in the land disappeared. He returned home and saw his son was missing and thus he grabbed his trusty boomerang and shield to venture out to the castle where it was told evil roamed the darkness for all eternity.

-

This game is a demo of a game that will be developed on and released next year (Most likely.) It is mostly inspired by the classic Castlevania games and other platformers of that era, with some light RPG elements. This demo includes the intro and level 1. There will be 7 levels in the actual game.

If you got any suggestions and/or criticisms I will gladly accept them, as it can make the game better in many ways! :)

Credits:

Programming - SeventyFour Productions

Spritework - SeventyFour Productions / Bro. Three

Music - Bro. Three

Testing - SeventyFour Productions / Bro. Three / Minefe

Additional help - Bro. Three

Controls:

Basic:

Left and Right arrow keys - Move.

A - Run.

S - Jump.

D - Throw and retrieve boomerang.

E - Throw knife.

W - Activate shield.

Up arrow (while in air) - Boomerang hover.

Down arrow (while in air) - Shield surf.

Misc:

Enter - Pause.

Q - Disable/Enable attacks.

Space - Switch camera mode.

F2 - Take screenshot.

All of these controls can be changed in the "Keybinds" menu in the options ;)

Other Details:

  • Fullscreen compatible - Yes. (Just click the icon for scaling up a window or press F11)
  • Resolution - 384x216, the pixels when scaling up are crispy and clear and every machine should be able to scale it up.
  • The game is not powerful in any way. If you experience lag of any kind please say so to me directly in the comments, since that is most likely just an optimization error.
  • Graphics - Black and white pixel art in any grayscale, clearly.
